message.body: Hello, I'm interested in the projection screen. I'm available tomorrow morning. Thanks, Hunter
Sorry I work during the day. I usually home by 430. So anytime after that is fine.7 should work tomorrow. Thanks Chris
Hello. I'm in west Philadelphia. I think I will avoid coming tonight due to weather. I have a meeting after work tomorrow, but I could come Thursday at 7pm if available
That fine. Just let me know. Thanks
